page.title: 15Shops in the Leeswood area
page.content: This area is served by several shops_ Brittania Stores,Post Offices,News Agents and the Spar etc. Brittania Stores sells a wide choice of food & confectionery goods and it is in the middle of Leeswood. The Post Offices in Leeswood,Coed Talon and Treuddyn sell confectionery and groceries etc. In the Post Office there is a Giro Bank for people to open a savings acount. The Spar is down in Coed Talon,it sells wines and spirits. All of these shops are quite small compared to the town shops and their prices are higher than the town prices by some 5 to 10%.
